item.dc:creator: Nick F.

item.title: Comment posted: Re: Investigate UI issue with Allure list of cars page (see attached note)
item.description:
When navigating to the Allure "list of cars" page, many times I'm not able to interact with the page at all. It's weird, I can scroll the page but can't highlight any of the cells or click anything. This happens on both the iOS simulator and my iPhone 4. If I go back to the homepage then click Allure again, I can usually interact with it then.

Company: Meridian | Project: Allure Auto Exhibition
item.dc:creator: Nick F.
